name: Sugar.EXE
description:
Sonic ate candi. He go crazy.

--- HOW U PLAY ---

Escape da Sonic.

Use Z key to jump. (but not for eggman because he is too fat. And not knuckles because I was too lazy to implement that.) Arrow keys to move. (Does not support WASD)
